00059 inline Cell* cons(Cell* const my_car, Cell* const my_cdr)
00060 {
00061   // as inline functions are used and the interface cannot be changed
00062   // nullp() and listp() are not used in the line below
00063   if (my_cdr != nil && !(my_cdr->is_cons())) {
00064     throw std::runtime_error("cdr can only store ConsCell or null");
00065   }
00066   return new ConsCell(my_car, my_cdr);
00067 }
00068 
00074 inline Cell* lambda(Cell* const my_formals, Cell* const my_body)
00075 {
00076   return new ProcedureCell(my_formals, my_body);
00077 }

00083 inline bool nullp(Cell* const c)
00084 {
00085   return (c == nil);

00092 inline bool listp(Cell* const c)
00093 {
00094   return nullp(c) || c->is_cons();

00102 {
00103   return !nullp(c) && c->is_procedure();
